questions.text: Which character rehearses her own funeral every month?
Why does Phenomena not mind the smell of her room?
questions.answer: A mishap with chlorine gas when she was four destroyed her sense of smell

questions.text: What character draws lizards on their arms?
Who does Aunt Schadenfreude forbid from marrying?
What was the cause of Arch-Aunt Schadenfreude's deadly fall?
questions.answer: She was pushed down the stairs

questions.text: Who is discovered to be the mastermind behind the plot to kill Aunt Schadenfreude?
What does Candour Swift do to try and kill all the Swifts at the reunion?
questions.answer: He dosed them with laughing gas

questions.text: Why does Candour Swift want to marry Daisy?
questions.answer: To gain access to her money

questions.text: Who is falsely accused of being the murderer by the Swift family?
Candour is discovered to have been scratched on the hand. By who?
is each family member named from a randomly selected word in the dictionary?
is the main character known for causing trouble because of her name?
does one character conduct a "practice funeral" each month?
is a clue to the mystery a civet coffee bean?
is a game of Scrabble to the death played?
does the main character create a map of her house in order to find buried treasure?
is lab equipment broken by the killer?
